contents: Article 7 (Broadcasting Rights Holder) ① The broadcasting rights holder may distribute marketing assets through broadcasting, transmission, distribution and other methods through various media such as television, radio, internet, mobile, etc. in accordance with the contract with the Sports Council. ② The broadcasting rights holder's broadcasting rights include competitions or events hosted by the Sports Council. ③ When using the broadcasting right, the holder of the broadcasting right must cooperate so that the advertisements and products of the sports conference sponsor or merchandising right holder are exposed.
